status.description:
COMPLETE: The operation completed, all requests are processed
PARTIAL: Some of the operations are successful, some failed
ASYNC: Operation running asynchronously
ERROR: Operation failed because of some system error

modifiedCount.description: number of entities affected by the call, if this is an insert, update, or delete

matchCount.description: total number of entities in the result set, if this is a find.

taskHandle.description: Only present if aysnchronous operation is requested, and status=async. Contains the task handle that the client can use to retrieve status information about the ongoing execution

session.description: Session information for the client. How this is used is implementation dependent, and TBD

processed.description: Projected entity information for processed entities. Applicable for all operations. Contains only successfully updated entities if insert, update, or delete. It is up to the caller to project identifying fields if caller needs.

errors.description: Array of errors for that particular object
